food_description: Freshly grilled salmon served on a bed of crisp greens with a tangy lemon vinaigrette.
Delicately seared scallops with a golden-brown crust, served with a rich butter sauce.
A refreshing mix of juicy peaches and blueberries, tossed with a light honey-mint dressing.
Juicy and tender ribeye steak, grilled to perfection, served with a side of garlic mashed potatoes.
